text: Lalkhawpuimawia (born 22 January 1992) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a forward for NorthEast United FC in the Indian Super League. ==Career== Prior to 2017 Lalkhawpuimawia was playing football in the Mizoram semi-professional lower leagues with Chhinga Veng FC. He signed with Aizawl in January 2018.
